original_text: For even that which was made glorious had no glory in this respect, by reason of the glory that excelleth.
korean_text: 영광되었던 것이 더 큰 영광으로 말미암아 이에 영광될 것이 없으나

sentences.original_text: For even that which was made glorious
had no glory in this respect
by reason of the glory that excelleth
